properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Mimi nimekuja,
mimi nimekuja,
na zawadi zangu,
Bwana pokea. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Mkate na divai,
Bwana pokea,
Mazao ya mashamba,
Bwana pokea.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Nafsi zetu zote,
Bwana pokea.
Nyoyo zetu zote,
Bwana pokea.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Fedha za mifuko,
Bwana pokea.
Na kanisa letu,
Bwana pokea.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Na maisha yetu,
Bwana pokea.
Na wazazi wetu,
Bwana pokea.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Na watoto wote,
Bwana pokea.
Na wakristu wote,
Bwana pokea.
